profile.name: The Elder Scrolls V - Skyrim
profile.script:
function OnEvent(event, arg, family) if event == "PROFILE_ACTIVATED" then SetBacklightColor(255,80,0,"kb") SetBacklightColor(255,80,0,"lhc") end
if event == "G_PRESSED" and (arg == 17 or arg == 18 or arg == 23 or arg == 24) then if IsModifierPressed("shift") then dualCasting = true if arg == 17 then OutputLCDMessage("Dual casting slot 7...") PressAndReleaseKey(0x08, 0x08) end if arg == 18 then OutputLCDMessage("Dual casting slot 8...") PressAndReleaseKey(0x09, 0x09) end if arg == 23 then OutputLCDMessage("Dual casting slot 5...") PressAndReleaseKey(0x06, 0x06) end if arg == 24 then OutputLCDMessage("Dual casting slot 6...") PressAndReleaseKey(0x07, 0x07) end end Sleep(500) if dualCasting then OutputLCDMessage("Dual casting...") PressMouseButton(1) PressMouseButton(3) else dualCasting = false OutputLCDMessage("Single casting...") PressMouseButton(3) end end
if event == "G_RELEASED" and (arg == 17 or arg == 18 or arg == 23 or arg == 24) then ReleaseMouseButton(1) ReleaseMouseButton(3) Sleep(500) if dualCasting then OutputLCDMessage("Equipping slot 1...") PressAndReleaseKey(0x02) end OutputLCDMessage("Equipping slot 2...") PressAndReleaseKey(0x03) dualCasting = false end end
